title: Blood Heir
description: *The final chapter in Cashel and Olivia's story*  Every love story has an ending. This is mine.  Cashel Blackthorne has been my kidnapper, my tormentor, my protecter, and my lover. Now he’s shattered us beyond repair.  He sacrificed his freedom to give me mine, only to have our bond completely broken. I lost him just when I truly found him. I need to bring him back to me, to save him from the fate he set for himself, and most of all, to find a cure.  Since all this began, I’ve been their prey, but the tables have turned and this time, I’m the hunter. The Blackthorne vampires won’t take anything from me again.
author: K. Loraine
